p: IC 50 of samples were calculated with the help of EZ-Fit enzyme kinetic software (Perrella Scientific, MA, Amherst). By serial dilutions of compounds to different concentrations, that is, from 0.5, 0.25, 0.125, 0.625, 0.03125, up to 0.015625mM, IC 50 values were calculated. With the help of graph, the concentration at which the inhibition was 50% or more was calculated as IC 50. Acarbose was positive control in the study. All values are mean of three independent variables.[ 18]
